name: Suicide Madness
description:
If you have issues please try to download the game! (bottom page)

𝐆𝐚𝐦𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐨

Suicide madness is a game about a guy that has to find every way possible to die. Explore 2 different maps filled with a bunch of ways to die. Try and see if you can find every way possible you can die in this game and most importantly have fun dying :) Remember failure is progress!

𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥𝐬

- WASD = Move Character

- Shift = Run / Sprint

- Space = Jump

- "E" = Interact

- ESC = Pause Game

𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐭𝐬

Programming and Unity Project Setup: TudyPie and PixelFireXY

3D models: Ultimate Low Poly Pack + Other free packages from the Unity asset store

Music and SoundFX : zapsplat

𝐀𝐝𝐝𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐨

This game was made in 72 hours for the Wowie Jam 3. We had fun working on this project and I hope you will like our game. If you encounter any bugs please leave a comment also don't forget to leave us some suggestions if you have any :) Thanks! 

If you want to be notified about other game updates or other games we will be working on follow us on Twitter: TudyPie twitter  and PixelFireXY twitter
